title: dimitriosm
author: dimitriosm
content: hello to the forum this is my first post!I have the motherboard, 1 Xeon Platinum 8160 cpu (ES), noctua cooler and 1 stick of 32GB of DDR4 ECC RAM.BIOS is modified to accept the ES/QS CPUs. Unfortunately, the power draw is too much to justify keeping this as a daily driver.Asking price is 600 euros + shipping OBOI also have another computer H610M-ED4 motherboard, i5 12400 CPU, and 2x8GB DDR4 RAM. Stock cooler included. Asking price 250 euros +shipping OBOEscrow from the forum will be used with NO exceptionsI can post pictures if someone is serious about buying (or if it is required by the forum)Payment method would be in USDT (TRC-20).Shipping is from Athens, Greece.Thank you!

comments.author: Papillion
comments.created_time: May 18, 2023, 04:23:28 PMLast edit: May 19, 2023, 01:57:31 AM by Papillion
comments.body: Quote from: dimitriosm on May 16, 2023, 08:24:48 AMEscrow from the forum will be used with NO exceptionsI can post pictures if someone is serious about buying (or if it is required by the forum)excellent, pictures would be great usually anything without doesnt get swooped up in one large purchase by this sort of thing.do you accept crypto as payments.thanks, %70

comments.author: dimitriosm
comments.body: hey,If i receive serious interest, pictures are not a problem. Which crypto do you mean?I would prefer USDT otherwise calculate the same amount in BTC or ETH at the time of purchase.Kind Regards
